title: Wright Brothers National Memorial: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar        Ranger presentation at one of the December 17. 1903 anniversaries of the Wright brothers' first flight National Park Service       Ranger programs are available throughout year. Use the search feature below to access our current schedule of ranger programs.   You can also check out the park newspaper for the summer program schedule.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 4 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Wright Brothers National Memorial First Flight Tour      Time: 1:00 PM to 1:30 PM,3:00 PM to 3:30 PM Location: Visitor Center Rear Patio Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 05/27/2016 to 09/04/2016 Step back in history during this short walk to the actual site of the Wright's first powered flights. Learn about the first flight and the events of that historic December day. View Details      Wright Brothers National Memorial Flight Room Talk       Time: 10:00 AM to 10:30 AM,12:00 PM to 12:30 PM,2:00 PM to 2:30 PM,4:00 PM to 4:30 PM Location: Visitor Center Auditorium Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Monday Weekly & Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 05/27/2016 to 09/05/2016 Learn about the Wrights and how they developed the first successful airplane.   View Details      Wright Brothers National Memorial Flight Room Talk       Time: 12:00 PM to 12:30 PM,2:00 PM to 2:30 PM,4:00 PM to 4:30 PM Location: Visitor Center Auditorium Fees: Free     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Every Tuesday Weekly  from 05/31/2016 to 08/30/2016 Learn about the Wrights and how they developed the first successful airplane. View Details      Wright Brothers National Memorial For Kids: Wright Kite      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Camp Buildings Fees: Free     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly  from 05/31/2016 to 09/01/2016 See a demonstration of kite-building and join in the fun of flying a homemade kite.
